# configuration

**Instance Property**

The current configuration of this interaction

## Declaration

```swift
var configuration: TabletopInteraction.Configuration { get }
```

## Getting the interaction properties

- **constants**: The constants of this interaction
- **initialPose**: The pose of the equipment that the interaction was started with
